title: Darkwing Duck, Vol. 3: F.O.W.L Disposition
description: “Let’s Get Dangerous” again with a brand new volume of Darkwing Duck stories! Something mysterious has emerged in the ranks of the formerly-most-fiendish secret organization on the planet — F.O.W.L. Inside F.O.W.L.’s remnants lurks a plot so insidious that Darkwing Duck has been enlisted to neutralize the nefarious notion by one of their own — Steelbeak! Don't miss the epic tale of…“F.O.W.L. DISPOSITION!” The Disney Afternoon Revolution is here at BOOM! Studios! Don’t miss out!
author: Ian Brill
